comment.text: CROOKED HILLAY IS JUST REALLY TOO NICE TO SAY...SHE IS A CRIMINAL.. AN EVIL SUPPORTER OF THE WORLD ORDER GLOBALIST... SICK AND DEMENTED.. HUMAN BEING. SHE WILL NOT HAVE TIME TO LEAD A NATION WHEN SHE IWLL BE UNDER INVESTIGATION THE ENTRIE TIME.
